post:
Hello! 
After the results of our previous LES [poll](https://talk.lowendspirit.com/discussion/2975/vote-on-apewebs-next-location "https://talk.lowendspirit.com/discussion/2975/vote-on-apewebs-next-location") the Norway location has been launched.

Use code LES-July for a 25% reoccurring discount (these offers will be LES exclusive for the next few days).

Prices below are incl discount. [Order](https://cms.apeweb.uk/index.php?rp=/store/vm "https://cms.apeweb.uk/index.php?rp=/store/vm") 

## VM1
KVM
512MB Ram
2 Cores @ 2.9 GHz 
10GB NVME storage or SSD storage
1x ipv4
ipv6 /64
Unmetered Bandwidth at gigabit
[Order](https://cms.apeweb.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=14 "https://cms.apeweb.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=14")
£1.88

## VM2
KVM
1024MB Ram
2 Cores @ 2.9 GHz
20GB NVME storage or SSD storage
1x ipv4
ipv6 /64
Unmetered Bandwidth at gigabit
[Order](https://cms.apeweb.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=15 "https://cms.apeweb.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=15")

## VM3
KVM
2GB Ram
2 Cores @ 2.9 GHz
40GB NVME storage or SSD storage
1x ipv4
ipv6 /64

[Order](https://cms.apeweb.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=16 "https://cms.apeweb.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=16")
£4.50

All VM plans on the store page will work with the LES-July code.

https://cms.apeweb.uk/index.php?rp=/store/vm

## Discount code -- LES-July

https://lg.no.apeweb.uk/
